description: Application user account that initiated the operation that was flagged as slow.
Captured request payload/parameters for the operation, stored as serialized JSON (e.g., report id, format, filters).
Source host or application URL where the request was initiated.
Target dataset or report identifier referenced by the request (table name or report ID); confirm with SME.
Internal API or service endpoint that processed the request.
Timestamp when the slow request event was recorded.
Optional free-text notes about the event, investigation, or remediation.
Elapsed time for the request to complete, likely measured in seconds; confirm unit with SME.
Event type indicating the stage of processing (e.g., start or completion) captured for the request.
